```{r}
gb_ct <- data_with_ct %>% group_by(census_tract) 
gb_ct_sum <-  gb_ct %>% summarize(n_inc = length(unique(IncidentGlobalID)))
gb_borough <- data_with_ct %>% group_by(Borough)
gb_borough_sum <- gb_borough %>% summarize(n_inc = length(unique(IncidentGlobalID)))
```
